text: Second, we had an elimination group but not a placebo group as a control. Psychological changes might have affected the present results. Third, we observed the efficacy of OIT only for a short period of 6 months. While previous studies have shown that desensitization was induced after OIT therapy, its long-term effect remains unknown. [30] [31] [32] [33] Therefore, a longer observation period is needed. Fourth, this was a singlecenter study. To exclude center-based bias, a multicenter study is required. Fifth, there was a significant difference between the two groups in cumulative tolerated dose before intervention, even though randomization had been performed. Although significant difference was observed after excluding patients with cumulative tolerated dose <200 mg, we could not evaluate the effectiveness of OIT in severe egg allergy patients.
sentences: Second, we had an elimination group but not a placebo group as a control.
Psychological changes might have affected the present results.
Third, we observed the efficacy of OIT only for a short period of 6 months.
While previous studies have shown that desensitization was induced after OIT therapy, its long-term effect remains unknown. [
30] [31] [32] [33] Therefore, a longer observation period is needed.
Fourth, this was a singlecenter study.
To exclude center-based bias, a multicenter study is required.
Fifth, there was a significant difference between the two groups in cumulative tolerated dose before intervention, even though randomization had been performed.
Although significant difference was observed after excluding patients with cumulative tolerated dose <200 mg, we could not evaluate the effectiveness of OIT in severe egg allergy patients.
